snippet.title: Shadows of Doubt - Official Console Announce & Sharpshooter Assassin Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Watch the latest trailer for Shadows of Doubt to learn more abou the Sharpshooter Assassin update, available now on Steam. The trailer also reveals Shadows of Doubt is coming to PS5 and Xbox Series X/S in 2024. An immersive sandbox detective stealth game set in a fully simulated sci-fi noir city of crime and corruption. Think like a private investigator and take on jobs to earn cash on your path to catching a serial killer. If you don’t catch them - they will kill again…
